mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT HORA_VENTA.* FROM FACTURA,HORA_VENTA WHERE HORA_VENTA.IDFACTURA = FACTURA.ID AND IDRESTAURANTE = #{restaurante} AND FECHA = #{fecha} ORDER BY FACTURA.FECHA ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HORARIO(ACTIVO, MES, ANYO) VALUES(#{activo},#{mes},#{anyo});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM HORARIO WHERE MES = #{mes} AND ANYO = #{anyo}
